Title: Relates to providing for the extension of NYSLRS service credit for any service credit lost due to either furlough or layoff of a member from when executive order 202 was issued through December 31, 2020
Summary: Provides for the extension of NYSLRS service credit for any service credit lost due to either furlough or layoff of a member from the period beginning when executive order 202 of 2020 was issued through December 31, 2020.
ActClause: AN ACT providing for the extension of NYSLRS service credit for any service credit lost due to either furlough or layoff of a member from the period beginning when executive order 202 of 2020 was issued through December 31, 2020
